# chkit Documentation

ClickHouse schema management and migration toolkit for TypeScript.

## Pages

- [chkit Documentation](https://chkit.obsessiondb.com/) - Public docs for chkit, a ClickHouse schema and migration CLI for TypeScript projects.
- [Getting Started](https://chkit.obsessiondb.com/getting-started/) - Install chkit and run the first migration flow.
- [CLI Overview](https://chkit.obsessiondb.com/cli/overview/) - Overview of all CLI commands.
